participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

erq_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1= RA-Administered ; 2= Youth Self-Administered ; 3= Combination

erq_feelings_control.Description: I control my feelings by not showing them | 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

erq_feelings_happy.Description: When I want to feel happier about something, I change the way I'm thinking about it | 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

erq_feelings_hide.Description: When I'm feeling bad (e.g., sad, angry, worried), I'm careful not to show it | 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

erq_feelings_less_bad.Description: When I want to feel less bad (e.g., sad, angry, worried) about something, I change the way I'm thinking about it. | 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

erq_feelings_self.Description: I keep my feelings to myself | 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

erq_feelings_think.Description: When I want to feel less bad (e.g., sad, angry, worried) about something, I think about something different. | 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer
